steps.step: step toward 12:00 into a reverse bow as you execute a inward to the outside of your opponent's left arm.
pivot into a neutral bow as you execute a outward to the outside of your opponent's left arm. Simultaneously execute a outward back knuckle to your opponent's left ribs.
Draw your left foot toward your right into a cat stance.
Execute a downward looping roundhouse to the top of your opponent's left calf.
